item.description:
Thank you Santo! We have a wonderful lineup of events for this Columbus Day weekend for those who are interested.

Friday, Oct 5  5pm - 10pm Featuring:
D.J International Music, Tony V & Marcello Sparagna (Italian Pop Music)

Saturday, Oct 6 1PM - 10 PM Featuring:
D.J International Music till 4pm then Emozioni Italian American Band, TonyV, Anna Rita & Marcello Sparagna

Sunday, Oct 7
9am Italian Mass
10:30am - Noon Parade (Parade begins at the corner of Franklin Avenue and Maple Avenue, proceeding down Franklin all the way to Columbus Park near the Wethersfield Town Line)

1PM to 7PM Entertainment Featuring:
Cuor d'italia Gruppo Folcloristico somewhere between 1 and 3PM
3-4pm Tony Allen Tribute to Frank Sinatra
4-5PM Gabriel Milluzzo Italian opera/classical songs 1/2 hour show
4:30 or 5 to 7PM Tommy Faienza & Enterprise Italian Pop Rock

 

Please click on the link to learn more about our Italian friend:

http://blogginghistories.blogspot.com/2011/01/christopher-columbus-and-his-discovery.html
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend/Parade Hartford,CT Oct.7 - Franklin Ave.
